ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: though We sent warners to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We had sent admonishers to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We had sent among them Messengers to warn them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We had certainly sent warners to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We had sent Heralds of warnings among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We sent among them warners;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We sent among them warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We sent among them warners;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily We sent among them warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: though We had sent warners among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We sent among them warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We had certainly sent warners among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We sent aforetime, among them, (messengers) to admonish them;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We sent among them warners (Messengers);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: though We had sent among them warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Even though We sent messengers to warn them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had already sent among them warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:72] and We certainly had sent among them warners, in the way of messengers to threaten [them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily We sent among them warners) but they disbelieved in them and, as a result, We destroyed them.
